trans-unit.target: TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_SEQ_00<tab>Fufulupa would entrust you with a matter of grave import.

TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_SEQ_01<tab>Fufulupa reveals that he has found a sealed letter addressed to Sultansworn Owyne among his disgraced predecessor's belongings. Uncertain of what to make of his discovery, he bids you deliver the letter to Momodi of the Quicksand, a steadfast supporter of the royal family.

TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_SEQ_02<tab>Momodi does not hesitate to brush aside your concerns, assuring you that Owyne would never betray the sultana. However, she has her own suspicions regarding the letter...
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_TODO_00<tab>Show the letter to Momodi.
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_FUFULUPA_000_1<tab>I salute you, honored friend. As acting captain, I should be much obliged if you would grant me a personal request.
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_FUFULUPA_000_2<tab>In our efforts to ascertain the full extent of the former captain's corruption, we have been poring over his personal correspondence.
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_FUFULUPA_000_3<tab>Our search unearthed this sealed letter addressed to a man named Owyne.
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_FUFULUPA_000_4<tab>But he is one of the Sultansworn elite! I can think of no reason why he should have any dealings with Baldewyn!
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_FUFULUPA_100_4<tab>We now know that the former captain was consorting with a coalition of criminals... Could it be that Owyne was, too!?
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_FUFULUPA_000_5<tab>This letter may well serve as evidence of their collusion, and so I dare not tamper with it myself.
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_FUFULUPA_000_6<tab>But given the events of recent days, I knew not whom to trust with this information─until now.

TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_FUFULUPA_000_7<tab>I have chosen you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Pray bear the letter to Mistress Momodi of the Quicksand, and relate the circumstances of its discovery.
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_FUFULUPA_000_8<tab>Not only is she a staunch supporter of the sultana, but she is well acquainted with the Sultansworn. She will know how best to proceed.
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_MOMODI_000_10<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It's been too long! Dadanen tells me you've been keepin' busy in Horizon.
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_MOMODI_000_11<tab>I want you to know that I'm grateful for everythin' you've done for the people of Ul'dah.
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_MOMODI_000_12<tab>Even though you've seen the seedier side of our city, you've continued to help your fellow man. Believe me, the folk around here love you for it.
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_MOMODI_000_13<tab>Hmmm? What is it? You look like you've got somethin' to say.
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_MOMODI_000_14<tab>...So <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> what this is all about.
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_MOMODI_000_15<tab>Fufulupa's thinkin' Owyne might've been in league with Baldewyn─that this letter could be proof of somethin' shady.
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_MOMODI_000_16<tab>Well he needn't worry. Owyne's as loyal a Sultansworn as I've ever known. I haven't the foggiest what this says, but─
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_MOMODI_000_17<tab>Wait a minute. Wasn't Owyne the one who...?
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_MOMODI_000_18<tab>Oh, hells... I've got a bad feelin' about this.
TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_MOMODI_000_19<tab>Listen, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─I think I know what this is all about, but I need you to swear to keep it quiet.

TEXT_MANWIL006_00628_MOMODI_000_20<tab>If you'd rather wash your hands of this business, I won't hold it against you. But if you're determined to see it through to the bitter end, say the word and I'll explain.
